scenes.title: Everest Ascent
scenes.description: Aged surfer turned hiker, Ryan embarks on a climb of Mount Everest, sharing reflections about his past and his journey.

shots.effects: Natural lighting, panoramic view, CG for realistic mountain scene
shots.scriptSegment: Camera pans across the breathtaking mountain, colossal, steep face adorned with ice and snow.

shots.action: Introduce Ryan, show him preparing for the climb
shots.effects: Natural lighting, CG for realistic mountain scene
shots.scriptSegment: Eventually, it zooms to reveal an aged surfer turned hiker, RYAN. He is burdened with a heavy backpack but his eyes are fierce, determined.

dialogue.speaker: RYAN
dialogue.text: All my life, waves were my Everest. Living, breathing giants forcing me to adapt, to navigate...

shots.action: Ryan begins his climb, footprints left behind
shots.effects: Natural lighting, CG for realistic mountain scene
shots.scriptSegment: Ryan begins his slow, steady ascent, footprints trailing behind in the snow.

dialogue.speaker: RYAN
dialogue.text: My father was an avid surfer. His last gift was a surfboard. As a child, I was petrified by the ocean... Its vastness. Its unpredictability.

shots.action: Show Ryan's struggle against the wind
shots.effects: Natural lighting, CG for realistic mountain scene, wind machine
shots.scriptSegment: A sudden gust of wind almost throws him off balance.

dialogue.speaker: RYAN
dialogue.text: I remember... plunging head first into those terrifying waves. Each crash felt like the end… but eventually, every fall, every failure… taught me to appreciate the surf’s ebb and flow…

shots.action: Show the steepness of the climb and Ryan's struggle
shots.effects: Natural lighting, CG for realistic mountain scene
shots.scriptSegment: Now, the ascent grows steeper. Ryan struggles, gasping for air. He stops, looking around at the majestic spectacle, a far cry from his ocean.

dialogue.speaker: RYAN
dialogue.text: Ocean, mountains... from one Everest to another, it's all about facing the fear, walking the treks life has chosen for us...

shots.action: Capture Ryan's determination despite the harsh conditions
shots.effects: Natural lighting, CG for realistic mountain scene
shots.scriptSegment: As he pushes forth, the unforgiving chill bites into his skin but he wears an unbeatable grin. This is his journey. His chronicle.
